title: House Building Finance Corporation (Repeal) Act, 2018 (Act No_XXV of 2018)
title_en: House Building Finance Corporation (Repeal) Act, 2018 (Act No_XXV of 2018)
description: Official consolidated text of House Building Finance Corporation (Repeal) Act, 2018 (Act No_XXV of 2018) (XXV of 2018) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title extent and commencement
provisions.content:
_ (1) This Act may be called the House
Building Finance Corporation (Repeal) Act, 2018.
(2)    It shall come into force at once.
